Career Counseling (Antwerp)

career development
Location:

Online or UAntwerp Campus Drie Eiken

Start date:

01 December 2022

Duration:

Sessions of 1.5h can be booked throughout the year

Objectives

The aim of the individual career counselling sessions is to support VIB employees with urgent career questions.

Approach

The Career Counselling sessions take 90 minutes and will give you the opportunity to help you with:

  • Extra support for preparing an application
  • Practising a job interview
  • Motivational questions 
  • Discussing a career opportunity
  • Work life balance
  • Dealing with stress
  • Preparing for a performance review with your group leader
  • Etcetera.
Event intended for

Everybody working at VIB with urgent career questions

Extra information
  • A booking can be cancelled until 24 hours before the actual career counselling takes place. Otherwise it will be considered as actual career counselling hours.
  • The career counselling will take place at VIB offices in Antwerp or via Teams or zoom, dependent on the number of participants and your own preference. Participants will be informed consequently.
  • The career counselling sessions are also organised in Leuven, Ghent and Brussels.
Video
Remote video URL

Trainers

Lucia Smit, Braingain

Doctor Lucia Smit is a professional career guide for PhDs and postdoctoral researchers. After finishing her dissertation on the careers of PhDs in the private sector at the Vrije Universiteit Brussel, she started to guide high potentials in their careers and developed several tools to optimize their placement in a non-academic context. Doctor Lucia Smit is member of international OECD working group on the careers of doctorate holders and consultant for private companies on their R&D and HR strategy for more than 10 years.

 

Contact Lucia Smit, Braingain :
info@braingain.be
